entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Greater Napanee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:09 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 1:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 0.7°C
Wind: ENE 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 near midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
